author: imigroome3
title: It’s National Puppy Day, so here are your puppies
text:
A Labrador Retriever puppy frolicking on a sunny spring day (Picture: Getty) It’s National Puppy Day in the US – but that’s all the excuse the rest of us need to celebrate the joy puppies bring to this world. 
The day is designed to encourage people to adopt a furry friend – as millions of unwanted puppies sit in shelters every day.
A day in the life of Elisabeth Kruger, a climate warrior If you don’t have space for a puppy in your home, people are encouraged to donate to their local shelter, so that they can find a loving family.
We know why you clicked onto this page, so without any further ado, here’s the content you asked for. You’re welcome.
Happy #NationalPuppyDay pic.twitter.com/sR1HOgO1iX
